name: Executions - f-PFI
query:
SELECT `tabJob Card`.work_order AS "Work Order", 
`tabJob Card`.name AS "Job Card", 
`tabJob Card`.item_name AS "Model-Size:Data:120", 
`tabJob Card Time Log`.employee AS "Employee", 
`tabJob Card Time Log`.from_time AS "From Time:Date:120",
`tabJob Card Time Log`.to_time AS "To Time", 
`tabJob Card`.time_required/`tabJob Card`.for_quantity AS "Unit Time:Float:50",
`tabJob Card Time Log`.time_in_mins AS "Exec Time, min:Float:50",
`tabJob Card`.time_required/`tabJob Card`.for_quantity * `tabJob Card Time Log`.completed_qty  AS "Est. Time, min:Float:50", 
`tabJob Card`.for_quantity AS "QTY:int:90",
`tabJob Card Time Log`.completed_qty AS "Completed Qty:int:90",
`tabJob Card`.operation AS "Operation" 
FROM `tabJob Card Time Log` INNER JOIN `tabJob Card` ON `tabJob Card`.name = `tabJob Card Time Log`.parent 
WHERE (`tabJob Card`.docstatus= (1 or 0) AND `tabJob Card Time Log`.docstatus= (1 or 0) ) 
AND  (`tabJob Card Time Log`.time_in_mins > 0 AND `tabJob Card Time Log`.to_time BETWEEN %(from)s AND  DATE_ADD(%(until)s, INTERVAL 1 DAY)  )
ORDER BY `tabJob Card Time Log`.employee, `tabJob Card Time Log`.to_time;

name: Executions - f1-PFI
query:
SELECT
    jc.work_order AS "Work Order",
    jc.name AS "Job Card", 
    jc.item_name AS "Model-Size:Data:120",
    jctl.employee AS "Employee",
    jctl.from_time AS "From Time:Date:120",
    jctl.to_time AS "To Time",
    ROUND(
        COALESCE(
            bom_op.time_in_mins / NULLIF(bom_op.batch_size, 0),
            jc.time_required / NULLIF(jc.for_quantity, 0)
        ), 
        2
    ) AS "Unit Time:Float:50",
    jctl.time_in_mins AS "Exec Time, min:Float:50",
    ROUND(
        COALESCE(
            (bom_op.time_in_mins / NULLIF(bom_op.batch_size, 0)) * jctl.completed_qty,
            (jc.time_required / NULLIF(jc.for_quantity, 0)) * jctl.completed_qty
        ),
        2
    ) AS "Est. Time, min:Float:50",
    jc.for_quantity AS "QTY:int:90",
    jctl.completed_qty AS "Completed Qty:int:90",
    jc.operation AS "Operation"
FROM `tabJob Card Time Log` jctl
INNER JOIN `tabJob Card` jc 
    ON jc.name = jctl.parent
    AND jc.docstatus IN (0, 1)
LEFT JOIN `tabWork Order` wo 
    ON wo.name = jc.work_order
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM` bom 
    ON bom.name = wo.bom_no
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM Operation` bom_op 
    ON bom_op.parent = bom.name 
    AND bom_op.operation = jc.operation
WHERE
    jctl.docstatus IN (0, 1)
    AND jctl.time_in_mins > 0
    AND jctl.to_time BETWEEN %(from)s AND DATE_ADD(%(until)s, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY 
    jctl.employee, 
    jctl.to_time;

name: Executions - f2
query:
SELECT
    jc.work_order AS "Work Order",
    jc.name AS "Job Card", 
    jc.item_name AS "Model-Size:Data:120",
    COALESCE(
        (SELECT abbr FROM `tabItem Attribute Value` 
         WHERE parent = iv_colour.attribute 
         AND attribute_value = iv_colour.attribute_value),
        iv_colour.attribute_value
    ) AS "Colour:Data:80",
    COALESCE(
        (SELECT abbr FROM `tabItem Attribute Value` 
         WHERE parent = iv_size.attribute 
         AND attribute_value = iv_size.attribute_value),
        iv_size.attribute_value
    ) AS "Size:Data:50",
    jctl.employee AS "Employee",
    jctl.from_time AS "From Time:Date:120",
    jctl.to_time AS "To Time",
    ROUND(
        COALESCE(
            bom_op.time_in_mins / NULLIF(bom_op.batch_size, 0),
            jc.time_required / NULLIF(jc.for_quantity, 0)
        ), 
        2
    ) AS "Unit Time:Float:50",
    jctl.time_in_mins AS "Exec Time, min:Float:50",
    ROUND(
        COALESCE(
            (bom_op.time_in_mins / NULLIF(bom_op.batch_size, 0)) * jctl.completed_qty,
            (jc.time_required / NULLIF(jc.for_quantity, 0)) * jctl.completed_qty
        ),
        2
    ) AS "Est. Time, min:Float:50",
      ROUND(
          (  NULLIF(
                ROUND(
                    COALESCE( 
                        (bom_op.time_in_mins / NULLIF(bom_op.batch_size, 0)) * jctl.completed_qty,  -- Added closing ) 
                        (jc.time_required / NULLIF(jc.for_quantity, 0)) * jctl.completed_qty         -- Added closing ) 
                    ), 
                   2 
               ), 
               0 
           ) / jctl.time_in_mins 
       ) * 100,
        0  -- Round to integer
   ) AS "Performance:int:50",
   jc.for_quantity AS "QTY:int:90",
    jctl.completed_qty AS "Completed Qty:int:90",
    jc.operation AS "Operation"
FROM `tabJob Card Time Log` jctl
INNER JOIN `tabJob Card` jc 
    ON jc.name = jctl.parent
    AND jc.docstatus IN (0, 1)
LEFT JOIN `tabWork Order` wo 
    ON wo.name = jc.work_order
LEFT JOIN `tabItem Variant Attribute` iv_colour
    ON iv_colour.parent = wo.production_item
    AND iv_colour.attribute = 'Colour'
LEFT JOIN `tabItem Variant Attribute` iv_size
    ON iv_size.parent = wo.production_item
    AND iv_size.attribute = 'Size'
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM` bom 
    ON bom.name = wo.bom_no
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM Operation` bom_op 
    ON bom_op.parent = bom.name 
    AND bom_op.operation = jc.operation
WHERE
    jctl.docstatus IN (0, 1)
    AND jctl.time_in_mins > 0
    AND jctl.to_time BETWEEN %(from)s AND DATE_ADD(%(until)s, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY 
    jctl.employee, 
    jctl.to_time;
